name: potassium nitrate production | potassium nitrate | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/5144/documentation

This dataset is a weighted average from the respective regional datasets.;This dataset represents the production of 1 kg of potassium nitrate, with 14% N and 44% K2O, from potassium chloride and nitric acid. Potassium nitrate (formula KNO3) is an ionic salt of potassium ions K+ and nitrate ions NO3-. Potassium nitrate is found in nature as a mineral called niter. For industrial applications, potassium nitrate is produced by neutralizing nitric acid with potassium hydroxide derived from potassium chloride. This reaction is highly exothermic: KOH + HNO3 → KNO3 + H2O;Potassium nitrate is used as compound fertiliser to enrich the soil in nitrogen (N), and potassium (K), two of the main macronutrients needed to support plant growth. It is also used in tree stump removal, rocket propellants and fireworks and is one of the major constituents of gunpowder (black powder). In processed meats, potassium nitrate reacts with hemoglobin and generates a pink color.;The main data sources for this dataset ia Althaus et al (2007).;References:;Althaus H.-J., Chudacoff M., Hischier R., Jungbluth N., Osses M. and Primas A. (2007) Life Cycle Inventories of Chemicals. ecoinvent report No. 8, v2.0. EMPA Dübendorf, Swiss Centre for Life Cycle Inventories, Dübendorf, CH.

The activity includes all the raw and processed materials necessary to produce this product. Nitric acid, potassium chloride and heat (as natural gas) are included. No direct emissions are included.

The activity ends with the final product being ready for transportation at the production site.
category: C:Manufacturing/20:Manufacture of chemicals and chemical products/201:Manufacture of basic chemicals, fertilizers and nitrogen compounds, plastics/2012:Manufacture of fertilizers and nitrogen compounds

processDocumentation.timeDescription: Primary data were collected on fertiliser production for the year 2007. These data were based on annual average data for the year 2007.
processDocumentation.geographyDescription: This dataset is a weighted average built from the following geographies: CN, RNA, RER.
processDocumentation.technologyDescription: Average techlogy from the regional counterparts as given in the geography comment.
processDocumentation.dataTreatmentDescription:
This dataset was built as a weighted average of regional datasets of the same activityName.  Weights are based on production volumes.
CN: production volume = 2.16e+09 kg/year, weight = 0.6708
RNA: production volume = 1.03e+09 kg/year, weight = 0.3199
RER: production volume = 3e+07 kg/year, weight = 0.009309
